title: Jump, Frog, Jump!
description: "This is the turtle that slid into the pond and ate the snake that dropped from a branch and swallowed the fish that swam after the frogâ€”JUMP, FROG, JUMP!" This infectious cumulative tale will have the young frogs you know jumping and chanting with joy. Jump, Frog, Jump has been a winning story-time favorite long enough for it to have teacher and parent fans who first enjoyed it in their own preschool classroom. "Extremely satisfying edge-of-the-seat fun for very small readers." ( Kirkus starred review)
author: Robert Kalan
